Others: Shakib Al Hasan's availability for the match is uncertain due to an injury to his left quadriceps.
India's batters have shown vulnerability against left-arm finger spin, a skill that Shakib Al Hasan has mastered.
Bangladesh have won three of their last four ODIs against India, including the recent Asia Cup fixture.
The pitch at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune is expected to favor batters.
India's bowling coach Paras Mhambrey stated that they have no special strategy to counter Shakib Al Hasan.
